item.description:
Snow Tubing with lots of Hot Chocolate & whip cream !

Let it snow, let it snow, let it snow......

This is ALWAYS a fun event! Let's get together and tube. Fun for all ages, no expertise level involved :-)

We can get a group discount with 15 or more people, and we call ahead to book it with them. Per Lori, the regular rate is $28/2 hrs, group rate is $28/3 hrs. You CAN'T purchase tickets online to get the group rate. Group package time is 9-12 on the weekends. This allows us to relax and have hot cocoa and snack breaks as needed. Here's the link to their website: http://www.skinashoba.com/tubing.html

If Mother Nature doesn't cooperate, we can schedule a different date.

Some specifics:

  • Minimum requirements are 42" in height or 6 years old to participate.
  • One person per tube. Doubles or group tubing may be allowed based on conditions.
  • Please note that warmer weather or fresh snow (man-made or natural) make for slower tubing conditions!

in order to get the Group Rates we have to purchase the tickets at the same time - so please don't be late.

I will send out my phone number a few days before (if I forget, someone remind me) that or just click on the Blue Moon link to the left - that's me !

FYI - the Tubing park is not in the same area as the ski resort. So go to the address listed above. Someone will mess this up I promise - and when they do, they will have to wear the "hat of shame" all day.
